metadata.name: Shard #1
metadata.description:
|LUCID DREAMING| consists of 12 colored shards. Each fragment has power, the energy of the Siberian spirit is concentrated reflected in this picture. Perhaps, someone lucky will be able to get together the whole picture |LUCID DREAMING| .

The work was drawn with a gel pen inspired by the throat singing of shamans.  The program Illustrator was also used because neoshamanism allows this.
